creator: shaamcom_83@yahoo.co.in
text:
Currently JMeter ANT task generates XML/CSV results. For parsing the XML results
we have the XSLT parser which parses the XSL file and generates the HTML report.
Whereas, we dont have a parser to parse the CSV results and create an HTML report.

creator: shaamcom_83@yahoo.co.in
text:
Created attachment 19688
Parser for CSV output of JMeter ant task

Parser for CSV output of JMeter ant task

creator: shaamcom_83@yahoo.co.in
text:
I have uploaded a JTL Parser (JTLParser.zip) which parses the CSV output of
JMeter and produces the following output apart from creating the html file.

**************Final Result******************
         Total Tests Executed : 115
         Total Passed         : 49
         Total Failed         : 66
         Pass Percentage      : 42.60%
********************************************

"Trial.html" will be created under the same folder 

File name depends on the input file name. For example:
For the input file - web-20.jtl, the output file name would be web-20.html.
Since Bug 58653 fixing this does not seem useful.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
